snippet: The repeal of the policy has been one of the most controversial issues for the military in recent years, and some service members are still resistant to gays and lesbians serving openly in the military.
abstract: The repeal of the policy has been one of the most controversial issues for the military in recent years, and some service members are still resistant to gays and lesbians serving openly in the military.

headline.main: A Year on, Marines Divided on Repeal of 'Don't Ask, Don't Tell'
